name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: Premium noise-cancelling wireless headphones with 30-hour battery life and superior sound quality. Perfect for music lovers and travelers.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Advanced smartwatch with heart rate monitoring, GPS tracking, sleep analysis, and smartphone notifications. Water-resistant up to 50 meters.

name: Organic Cotton T-Shirt
description: Comfortable and sustainable t-shirt made from 100% organic cotton. Available in multiple colors and sizes for everyday wear.

name: Ceramic Coffee Mug Set
description: Set of 4 beautifully crafted ceramic mugs with ergonomic handles. Microwave and dishwasher safe for daily use.

name: Professional Chef's Knife
description: High-quality 8-inch chef's knife made from Japanese stainless steel. Perfect balance and sharpness for all your cooking needs.

name: Yoga Mat Premium
description: Non-slip, eco-friendly yoga mat with alignment markers. Provides excellent cushioning and support for all types of yoga practice.

name: Desk Lamp with Wireless Charger
description: Modern LED desk lamp with adjustable brightness and built-in wireless charging pad. USB ports for additional device charging.

name: Backpack with USB Port
description: Durable waterproof backpack with dedicated laptop compartment, USB charging port, and multiple organizational pockets.
